parameters.name: Celt
parameters.description: Number of faces for the faces enumeration

parameters.name: Rgelt
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of faces of size Celt

parameters.name: PceltFetched
parameters.description: Pointer to the number of faces returned from the list; this value can be less than Celt if you asked for more faces than exist, or it can be NULL if no more faces exist

title: IEnumFaces2.Next
description: Gets the next face in the faces enumeration.
signature:
void Next( 
   System.Int32
Celt
,
   out Face2
Rgelt
,
   out System.Int32
PceltFetched
)

parameters.name: Celt
parameters.description: Number of faces for the faces enumeration

parameters.name: Rgelt
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of faces of size Celt

parameters.name: PceltFetched
parameters.description: Pointer to the number of faces returned from the list; this value can be less than Celt if you asked for more faces than exist, or it can be NULL if no more faces exist

remarks: For use in in-process DLLs only.
